ChunkText: although international student and scholar services isss sends reminders before the I-20 end date, it is your responsibility to ensure timely application for an extension. application process login to your isss portal. click on search forms in the top right corner of the page. choose the relevant request, which is the program extension f-1.
ContextBefore: deadline please note that your form I-20 can only be extended up until the current end date. after your current I-20 end date passes, we can no longer extend the date into the future. it is important to plan ahead for this deadline.
ContextAfter: complete all sections of the application as per the directions provided. ensure that you obtain electronic support from your academic advisor as indicated in the recommendations section. after uploading all necessary requirements, click submit. isss advisors will review your application and contact you after receiving your advisors recommendation.
